specific - relation - general.cyper_for_result_page_all_nodes_specific: MATCH (snp_node:variants {id: '@sequence_variant@'})-[r:fine_mapped_eQTL]-(gene_node:coding_elements {id: '@gene@'}) OPTIONAL MATCH (snp_node)-[r1]-(extend_node_snp) OPTIONAL MATCH (gene_node)-[r2]-(extend_node_gene) RETURN snp_node, r, gene_node, r1, extend_node_snp, r2, extend_node_gene
next_questions: Which {function ontologies@ontology} are linked to {gene identifier@n1:gene}?
